title: un pada malariNai
sahitya:
un pada malariNai maravEnE aDimai nAn enrum


anupallavi

  annai tan madalai tannai marappinum avaniyOr aravE ennaik-kaiviDinum


caraNam    porumai bhUSaNamAi pUNDu bhuviyil veruppu viruppinri vAzhndennALum
 dharmamuDan sat-karmangaL sheidE piravA varamE peravE rAmA
